original_text: People who live in the towns of the desert should shout aloud to praise him. Kedar's people should praise him in the places where they live. The people who live in Sela should sing aloud with joy. They should shout from the tops of the mountains. People who live in the towns of the desert should shout aloud to praise him. Kedar's people should praise him in the places where they live. The people who live in Sela should sing aloud with joy. They should shout from the tops of the mountains. People who live in the towns of the desert
korean_text: 광야와 거기에 있는 성읍들과 게달 사람이 사는 마을들은 소리를 높이라 셀라의 주민들은 노래하며 산 꼭대기에서 즐거이 부르라

should shout aloud to praise him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 찬양하기 위해 큰 소리로 외쳐야 합니다
